org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl
Class LTLRewriterAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.AbstractLTLRewriter
      org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.LTLRewriterAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
LTLRewriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
EH2000
public class LTLRewriterAdapter
extends AbstractLTLRewriter

This class provides a rewriter that does not rewrite any LTL formula.

Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"

          Constructs this rewriter.
